message: Hello. My name is Chris. Thank you for reaching out to VoyageQuest. How can I assist you with your travel plans today?
Hi, I'm looking to book a trip but wanted to ask about payment options. Is direct debit an option?
I'd be happy to provide more information, John! Let's just run through security first. Can you confirm your name? Can you also confirm your address? Finally, please confirm your reference number.
Sure, my name is John Smith, my address is 124 Main Street, and my account number is 123456.
Thank you, John. That's all correct! Yes, direct debit is an option for payment. You can set up monthly installments or a one-time payment. Would you like me to provide details on how to set it up?
Monthly installments sound good. How does it work?

With our installment plan, you can spread the cost over 6 or 12 months with no interest. The first payment is due at booking, and the remaining balance is automatically debited from your bank account each month. Would you like me to send you the setup form?
Yes, please. I’d like to review the form before proceeding.
Of course, John! I’ll email you the form along with details on payment schedules and terms. Let me know if you have any questions once you’ve reviewed it.
Thanks, Chris. I’ll check it and get back to you.
You're very welcome, John! I'll follow up with you in a couple of days. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all for now. Thanks again, Chris.
You're very welcome! Have a great day, and feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance. Goodbye!
